snippet.title: Crossfire Game Jam Trailer
snippet.description:
Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2018 with the theme: Genre without mechanic.
Crossfire is a Shooter where you can't shoot. Instead, you must dive into your enemy's crossfire in an attempt to get them to shoot themselves.

Download Crossfire here: https://seet.itch.io/crossfire

Crossfire is a game made for the 2nd Mark Brown's GMTK Game Jam with the theme of "Genre without Mechanic" where developers are challenged with choosing an existing game genre and removing one of the core mechanics associated with that genre. For example a platformer where you can't jump.
